subject: Re: Shipping Method
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team, Awesome thank you for swift response :) Thanks again, Sent from my iPhone On Sep 1, 2025, at 12:47 AM, support@simsonn.com wrote: ﻿ Hello, we will deliver it to you by UPS support@simsonn.com From: Frank Galdamez Date: 2025-09-01 14:32 To: support Subject: Shipping Method Hello Simon Team,
 
 
 I made a purchase from your Simsonn page on Ali Express, I live in US and the product will get shipped from the US based from Alii Express. I wanted to know what shipping methods does your team use? ex: (UPS,Fedex or DHL?) Where I live packages tend to get lost, Is it possible to request package to be delivered be UPS or Fedex? 
 
 
 Thanks!

conversations.body_text: ID 为 3341 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单3341  
      主题: Shipping Method  
      描述:  Hello Simon Team,  I made a purchase from your Simsonn page on Ali Express, I live in US and the product will get shipped from the US based from Alii Express. I wanted to know what shipping methods does your team use? ex: (UPS,Fedex or DHL?) Where I live packages tend to get lost, Is it possible to request package to be delivered be UPS or Fedex?   Thanks!
